articles.title: Salman Rushdie now off ventilator and can talk, says agent; accused Hadi Matar pleads not guilty to attempted
articles.description: He was stabbed on stage ahead of a speaking event at the Chautauqua Institution on Friday evening. According to the New York State Police, the male suspect - later identified as Matar - had run up on stage and attacked the writer. Rushdie suffered an apparent…
articles.content: Rushdie, whose writing led to death threats from Iran in the 1980s, was attacked as he was about to give a lecture at the Chautauqua Institution.
